mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.officework_code AS "officeworkCode", a.officework_name AS "officeworkName", a.officework_dep AS "officeworkDep", a.officework_post AS "officeworkPost", a.officework_edu AS "officeworkEdu", a.officework_marry AS "officeworkMarry", a.officework_pol AS "officeworkPol", a.officework_sex AS "officeworkSex", a.officework_phone AS "officeworkPhone", a.officework_birth AS "officeworkBirth", a.officework_idcard AS "officeworkIdcard", a.join_date AS "joinDate", a.doc_site AS "docSite", a.doc_no AS "docNo", a.from_uni AS "fromUni", a.officework_comp AS "officeworkComp", a.last_comp AS "lastComp", a.overuni_time AS "overuniTime", a.officework_major AS "officeworkMajor", a.input_time AS "inputTime", a.officework_level AS "officeworkLevel", a.officework_addr AS "officeworkAddr", a.work_status AS "workStatus", a.post_level AS "postLevel", a.officework_nation AS "officeworkNation", a.officework_quarters AS "officeworkQuarters", a.officework_sales AS "officeworkSales", a.contract_flg AS "contractFlg", a.officework_flg AS "officeworkFlg", a.officework_cancel AS "officeworkCancel", a.ext_field1 AS "extField1", a.ext_field2 AS "extField2", a.ext_field3 AS "extField3", a.remark AS "remark"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM doc_officework a
AND a.officework_code LIKE '%'||#{officeworkCode}||'%' '%'+#{officeworkCode}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{officeworkCode}, '%')
AND a.officework_name LIKE '%'||#{officeworkName}||'%' '%'+#{officeworkName}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{officeworkName}, '%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO doc_officework( officework_code, officework_name, officework_dep, officework_post, officework_edu, officework_marry, officework_pol, officework_sex, officework_phone, officework_birth, officework_idcard, join_date, doc_site, doc_no, from_uni, officework_comp, last_comp, overuni_time, officework_major, input_time, officework_level, officework_addr, work_status, post_level, officework_nation, officework_quarters, officework_sales, contract_flg, officework_flg, officework_cancel, ext_field1, ext_field2, ext_field3, remark ) VALUES ( #{officeworkCode}, #{officeworkName}, #{officeworkDep}, #{officeworkPost}, #{officeworkEdu}, #{officeworkMarry}, #{officeworkPol}, #{officeworkSex}, #{officeworkPhone}, #{officeworkBirth}, #{officeworkIdcard}, #{joinDate}, #{docSite}, #{docNo}, #{fromUni}, #{officeworkComp}, #{lastComp}, #{overuniTime}, #{officeworkMajor}, #{inputTime}, #{officeworkLevel}, #{officeworkAddr}, #{workStatus}, #{postLevel}, #{officeworkNation}, #{officeworkQuarters}, #{officeworkSales}, #{contractFlg}, #{officeworkFlg}, #{officeworkCancel}, #{extField1}, #{extField2}, #{extField3}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE doc_officework SET officework_code = #{officeworkCode}, officework_name = #{officeworkName}, officework_dep = #{officeworkDep}, officework_post = #{officeworkPost}, officework_edu = #{officeworkEdu}, officework_marry = #{officeworkMarry}, officework_pol = #{officeworkPol}, officework_sex = #{officeworkSex}, officework_phone = #{officeworkPhone}, officework_birth = #{officeworkBirth}, officework_idcard = #{officeworkIdcard}, join_date = #{joinDate}, doc_site = #{docSite}, doc_no = #{docNo}, from_uni = #{fromUni}, officework_comp = #{officeworkComp}, last_comp = #{lastComp}, overuni_time = #{overuniTime}, officework_major = #{officeworkMajor}, input_time = #{inputTime}, officework_level = #{officeworkLevel}, officework_addr = #{officeworkAddr}, work_status = #{workStatus}, post_level = #{postLevel}, officework_nation = #{officeworkNation}, officework_quarters = #{officeworkQuarters}, officework_sales = #{officeworkSales}, contract_flg = #{contractFlg}, officework_flg = #{officeworkFlg}, officework_cancel = #{officeworkCancel}, ext_field1 = #{extField1}, ext_field2 = #{extField2}, ext_field3 = #{extField3}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
